content: {"name": "Christian Assembly of the Bronx - NYC Love Kitchen", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients need to register with their name and cell # so they will be placed on our list to receive texts about future pantry dates.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.cabx.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "659 East 188th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Belmont", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10458", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8558277, "longitude": -73.8849535}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 365-0078", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Mobile pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must have telephone number"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
